parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the cluster to which the resource group belongs.

parameters.name: InstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the instance in a resource group. For more information about how to obtain the instance name, see [ListServiceInstances](~~412129~~). HostName in the returned result indicates the name of the instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 100.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. For more information about how to query the ID of a resource group, see [ListResources](~~412133~~).
